summary: This document is an AT&T International Call Detail Record (ICDR) report for phone number (646)243-8317, covering calls from July 6 to August 11, 2019. It shows a pattern of international calls to and from countries including Switzerland, Belarus, Russia, France, and the UK, likely obtained as part of a law enforcement investigation into activities following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

events.title: International Call Activity Monitoring
events.description: A series of international phone calls to and from the number (646)243-8317, connecting with countries including Switzerland, Belarus, Russia, France, the UK, and Israel.

events.title: AT&T Records Query Execution
events.description: AT&T ran a query for call detail records for the specified phone number, producing this report for the period covering over a month after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

keyFacts: The document is a call detail record for phone number (646)243-8317, showing extensive international call activity between July 6 and August 11, 2019.
The record was generated by AT&T on August 15, 2019, indicating it was likely produced in response to a law enforcement request or subpoena.
Call destinations include Switzerland, Belarus, and Russiaâ€”countries of interest in the Epstein investigation for financial and associate connections.
The timing of the records (July-August 2019) corresponds with the period immediately following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The document shows both incoming and outgoing calls, with some connected calls lasting several minutes, suggesting active communication.
